attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Specifies whether to display arrows in the pop-up drop-down list box.

attrs.name: arrow-offset
attrs.desc: Set the offset of the pop-up drop-down arrow. The default value is 0.

attrs.name: placement
attrs.desc: Menu pop-up position. The value can be (top/top-start/top-end/bottom/bottom-start/bottom-end). The default value is bottom-end

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Specifies whether the pop-up drop-down list box is created under the body element.

slots.name: default
slots.desc: The drop-down list is usually a <tiny-dropdown-item> component.
